es.csic.iiia.bms.factors
Class ImplicationFactor<T>

java.lang.Object
  es.csic.iiia.bms.factors.AbstractFactor<T>
      es.csic.iiia.bms.factors.ImplicationFactor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the factor's identity.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Factor<T>
public class ImplicationFactor<T>
extends AbstractFactor<T>

Max-sum "Implication" factor.

Given an ordered set of neighbors {x_1, ..., x_n}, this factor tries to ensure that if the i-th neighbor is active (x_i = 1) all the following neighbors must be active. That is, f(x_1, ..., x_n) = 0 if x_i <= x_{i+1}, for all i in [1,n-1]; -Infinity, otherwise

Outgoing messages are computed in O(n) time. Where n is the number of neighbors.

Author:
Toni Penya-Alba , Marc Pujol
